
== About ==

gwt-gantt is a web-based Gantt Chart component similar to what you see in Microsoft Project. It is built in pure Java / GWT and can be easily integrated into any GWT application.

gwt-gannt was built after many lessons learned creating and maintaining the [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-cal/ gwt-cal] widget library. We hope to make gwt-gannt a simple, *easily customizable* widget library.

== Features ==

 * Gantt Chart widget with Week View
 * Tree table for displaying, expanding and collapsing Tasks
 * Heavily uses Deferred Binding allowing easy class substitution, customization
